00003 #include <sys/types.h>

00005 #include <net-snmp/net-snmp-includes.h>
00006 #include <net-snmp/agent/net-snmp-agent-includes.h>

00008 #include <net-snmp/agent/multiplexer.h>

00010 #if HAVE_DMALLOC_H
00011 #include <dmalloc.h>
00012 #endif
00013 
00035 netsnmp_mib_handler *
00036 netsnmp_get_multiplexer_handler(netsnmp_mib_handler_methods *req)
00037 {
00038     netsnmp_mib_handler *ret = NULL;
00039 
00040     if (!req) {
00041         snmp_log(LOG_INFO,
00042                  "netsnmp_get_multiplexer_handler(NULL) called\n");
00043         return NULL;
00044     }
00045 
00046     ret =
00047         netsnmp_create_handler("multiplexer",
00048                                netsnmp_multiplexer_helper_handler);
00049     if (ret) {
00050         ret->myvoid = (void *) req;
00051     }
00052     return ret;
00053 }
00054 
00056 int
00057 netsnmp_multiplexer_helper_handler(netsnmp_mib_handler *handler,
00058                                    netsnmp_handler_registration *reginfo,
00059                                    netsnmp_agent_request_info *reqinfo,
00060                                    netsnmp_request_info *requests)
00061 {
00062 
00063     netsnmp_mib_handler_methods *methods;
00064 
00065     if (!handler->myvoid) {
00066         snmp_log(LOG_INFO, "improperly registered multiplexer found\n");
00067         return SNMP_ERR_GENERR;
00068     }
00069 
00070     methods = (netsnmp_mib_handler_methods *) handler->myvoid;
00071 
00072     switch (reqinfo->mode) {
00073     case MODE_GETBULK:
00074         handler = methods->getbulk_handler;
00075         if (handler)
00076             break;
00077         /* Deliberate fallthrough to use GetNext handler */
00078     case MODE_GETNEXT:
00079         handler = methods->getnext_handler;
00080         if (handler)
00081             break;
00082         /* Deliberate fallthrough to use Get handler */
00083     case MODE_GET:
00084         handler = methods->get_handler;
00085         if (!handler) {
00086             netsnmp_set_all_requests_error(reqinfo, requests,
00087                                            SNMP_NOSUCHOBJECT);
00088         }
00089         break;
00090 
00091     case MODE_SET_RESERVE1:
00092     case MODE_SET_RESERVE2:
00093     case MODE_SET_ACTION:
00094     case MODE_SET_COMMIT:
00095     case MODE_SET_FREE:
00096     case MODE_SET_UNDO:
00097         handler = methods->set_handler;
00098         if (!handler) {
00099             netsnmp_set_all_requests_error(reqinfo, requests,
00100                                            SNMP_ERR_NOTWRITABLE);
00101             return SNMP_ERR_NOERROR;
00102         }
00103         break;
00104 
00105         /*
00106          * XXX: process SETs specially, and possibly others 
00107          */
00108     default:
00109         snmp_log(LOG_ERR, "unsupported mode for multiplexer: %d\n",
00110                  reqinfo->mode);
00111         return SNMP_ERR_GENERR;
00112     }
00113     if (!handler) {
00114         snmp_log(LOG_ERR,
00115                  "No handler enabled for mode %d in multiplexer\n",
00116                  reqinfo->mode);
00117         return SNMP_ERR_GENERR;
00118     }
00119     return netsnmp_call_handler(handler, reginfo, reqinfo, requests);
00120 }
